text: The Burkinabé Football Federation (; FBF) is the governing body of football in Burkina Faso. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1959. It became a member of FIFA and CAF in 1964. Category:1959 establishments in Africa Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Football in Burkina Faso
title: Burkinabé Football Federation
